Instruction: Slice cucumber and red onion thinly.
Spread Greek vinaigrette over the whole wheat tortilla.
Layer lettuce leaves, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, red onion slices, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese on top of the vinaigrette.
Roll the tortilla tightly, folding in the sides as you go.
Slice the wrap diagonally and serve.
